General.Name: Seronics Co. Ltd
General.Description: Seronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells electronic components in Korea and North America. It offers devices and flexible flat cables used in TV; Kitchen TV; DID and home network-based system products; and plastic injection molding and assembly products, as well as photovoltaic ribbon. Seronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Gumi-si, South Korea.
